summary.span: Defines the contract that ASP.NET implements to provide membership services using custom membership providers.

span.span: Defines the contract that ASP.NET implements to provide membership services using custom membership providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 成员资格旨在使你能够轻松地为 ASP.NET 应用程序中使用大量不同的成员资格提供程序。ASP.NET membership is designed to enable you to easily use a number of different membership providers for your ASP.NET applications. 可以使用提供的成员资格提供程序所包含的.NET Framework 中，或者可以实现自己的提供程序。You can use the supplied membership providers that are included with the .NET Framework, or you can implement your own provider. > [!NOTE] > 如果你不熟悉 ASP.NET 成员资格功能，请参阅[简介成员资格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980)才能继续。If you are not familiar with the membership features of ASP.NET, see [Introduction to Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980) before continuing. 与成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 在实现自定义成员资格提供程序时，你需要继承抽象类。When implementing a custom membership provider, you are required to inherit the abstract class. 有两个主要原因创建自定义成员资格提供程序。There are two primary reasons for creating a custom membership provider. - 你需要将成员资格信息存储在.NET Framework 中，如 FoxPro 数据库、 Oracle 数据库或其他数据源中包含的成员资格提供程序不支持的数据源。You need to store membership information in a data source that is not supported by the membership providers included with the .NET Framework, such as a FoxPro database, an Oracle database, or other data source. - 你需要管理使用的数据库架构不同于使用.NET Framework 会随附的提供程序的数据库架构中的成员身份信息。You need to manage membership information using a database schema that is different from the database schema used by the providers that ship with the .NET Framework. 此常见示例是针对公司或网站的 SQL Server 数据库中已存在的成员身份数据。A common example of this would be membership data that already exists in a SQL Server database for a company or Web site. 抽象类继承自抽象类。The abstract class inherits from the abstract class. 实现还必须实现的所需的成员。 implementations must also implement the required members of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值存储在具有相关的用户信息以将用户与特定的应用程序关联的数据源。The property value is stored in the data source with related user information to associate a user with a particular application. 此属性为读/写，默认值为如果未显式指定的属性值。This property is read/write and defaults to the property value if not specified explicitly. 成员资格提供程序存储单独为每个应用程序的用户信息，因为多个 ASP.NET 应用程序可以使用相同的数据源，而不会遇到冲突，如果会创建重复的用户名称。Because membership providers store user information uniquely for each application, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same data source without running into a conflict if duplicate user names are created. 或者，多个 ASP.NET 应用程序可以使用相同的用户数据源，通过指定相同。Alternatively, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user data source by specifying the same . 在成员资格提供程序实现中，你将需要确保你数据的架构，包括和数据源查询和更新还包括。In your membership provider implementation, you will need to ensure that your data schema includes the and that data source queries and updates also include the . ## Examples 有关的示例实现，请参阅[实现配置文件提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将新用户、 密码和电子邮件地址的名称作为输入，并将应用程序的新用户插入到数据源。Takes, as input, the name of a new user, a password, and an email address and inserts a new user for the application into the data source. 方法返回使用新创建的用户的信息填充的对象。The method returns a object populated with the information for the newly created user. 方法还定义`out`参数 (在 Visual Basic 中，你可以使用`ByRef`)，该属性返回值，该值指示用户已成功创建，或该用户创建失败原因。The method also defines an `out` parameter (in Visual Basic, you can use `ByRef`) that returns a value that indicates that the user was successfully created, or a reason that user creation failed. 方法引发事件，如果事件处理程序已指定，并继续或取消基于该事件的结果的创建用户操作。The method raises the event, if a event handler has been specified, and continues or cancels the create-user action based on the results of the event. 你可以使用才能执行指定的虚拟方法事件处理程序。You can use the virtual method to execute the specified event handler. ## Examples 有关的示例实现，请参阅[实现配置文件提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含在该配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的布尔值`enablePasswordReset`属性。 contains a Boolean value specified in the configuration file (Web.config) using the `enablePasswordReset` attribute. 值指示用户是否可以使用方法使用一个新的随机生成密码覆盖他们当前的密码。The value indicates whether users can use the method to overwrite their current password with a new, randomly generated password. 此属性是只读的。This property is read-only. ## Examples 有关的示例实现，请参阅[实现配置文件提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含在该配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的布尔值`enablePasswordRetrieval`属性。The property contains a Boolean value specified in the configuration file (Web.config) using the `enablePasswordRetrieval` attribute. 值指示用户是否可以使用方法来从数据源检索他们当前的密码。The value indicates whether users can use the method to retrieve their current password from the data source. 此属性是只读的。This property is read-only. 如果你自定义成员资格提供程序支持经过哈希处理的密码，你方法实现应引发异常，如果设置为`true`和密码格式设置为`Hashed`。If your custom membership provider supports hashed passwords, your method implementation should throw an exception if is set to `true` and the password format is set to `Hashed`. 无法检索经过哈希处理的密码。Hashed passwords cannot be retrieved. ## Examples 有关的示例实现，请参阅[实现配置文件提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

span.span: The number of invalid password or password-answer attempts allowed before the membership user is locked out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性与结合工作属性以防止不需要的源猜测的密码或密码提示问题答案的成员资格用户通过反复尝试。The property works in conjunction with the property to guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts. 无效密码或提供成员资格用户的密码提示问题数是否大于或等于属性值指定的分钟数内，然后通过设置锁定成员资格用户属性`true`直到用户解锁通过调用方法。If the number of invalid passwords or password questions supplied for a membership user is greater than or equal to the property value within the number of minutes identified by the , then the membership user is locked out by setting the property to `true` until the user is unlocked by a call to the method. 如果之前提供有效的密码或密码提示问题答案达到值、 跟踪的无效尝试次数的计数器重置为零。If a valid password or password answer is supplied before the value is reached, the counter that tracks the number of invalid attempts is reset to zero. 无效的密码和密码提示问题答案尝试次数累积独立于另一个。Invalid password and password-answer attempts accumulate independently of one another. 例如，如果属性设置为 5，和三个无效的密码尝试，随后进行了两个无效的密码提示问题答案尝试，则两个更多的无效密码尝试 （或三个更多的无效密码提示问题答案尝试） 必须进行内成员资格用户被锁定。For example, if the property is set to 5, and three invalid password attempts are made followed by two invalid password-answer attempts, two more invalid password attempts (or three more invalid password-answer attempts) must be made within the for the membership user to be locked out. 如果属性设置为`false`，则不会跟踪无效密码提示问题答案尝试次数。If the property is set to `false`, invalid password-answer attempts are not tracked. 跟踪中的无效密码和密码提示问题答案尝试次数， ， ， ，和方法。Invalid password and password-answer attempts are tracked in the , , , , and methods. ## Examples 有关的示例实现，请参阅[实现配置文件提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取的最小创建的有效密码时必须输入的字符数对象。The property gets the minimum number of characters that must be entered to create a valid password for the object. 在该应用程序配置中设置了属性值`minRequiredPasswordLength`属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)配置元素。The property value is set in the application configuration using the `minRequiredPasswordLength` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)中的配置元素`system.web`的应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分。The following example shows the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element in the `system.web` section of the application's Web.config file. 它指定应用程序使用的实例类以提供成员资格服务，并设置`minRequiredPasswordLength`属性设为七个字符。It specifies that the application use an instance of the class to provide membership services, and sets the `minRequiredPasswordLength` attribute to seven characters. ``` ```

summary.span: Gets the number of minutes in which a maximum number of invalid password or password-answer attempts are allowed before the membership user is locked out.

value.span: 在锁定成员资格用户之前允许的最大无效密码或无效密码提示问题答案尝试次数的分钟数。

span.span: The number of minutes in which a maximum number of invalid password or password-answer attempts are allowed before the membership user is locked out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性与结合工作属性以防止不需要的源猜测的密码或密码提示问题答案的成员资格用户通过反复尝试。The property works in conjunction with the property to guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts. 如果的无效密码或密码提示问题答案成员资格用户的数量超过在指定的分钟数内，然后通过设置锁定成员资格用户属性`true`直到用户解锁通过调用方法。If the number of invalid passwords or password questions supplied for a membership user exceeds the within the number of minutes identified by the , then the membership user is locked out by setting the property to `true` until the user is unlocked by a call to the method. 如果之前提供有效的密码或密码提示问题答案是达到，跟踪的无效尝试次数的计数器重置为零。If a valid password or password answer is supplied before the is reached, the counter that tracks the number of invalid attempts is reset to zero. 无效的密码和密码提示问题答案尝试次数累积独立于另一个。Invalid password and password-answer attempts accumulate independently of one another. 例如，如果属性设置为 5，和三个无效的密码尝试，随后进行了两个无效的密码提示问题答案尝试，则两个更多的无效密码尝试 （或三个更多的无效密码提示问题答案尝试） 必须进行内成员资格用户被锁定的值。For example, if the property is set to 5, and three invalid password attempts are made followed by two invalid password-answer attempts, two more invalid password attempts (or three more invalid password-answer attempts) must be made within the value for the membership user to be locked out. 如果属性设置为`false`，则不会跟踪无效密码提示问题答案尝试次数。If the property is set to `false`, invalid password-answer attempts are not tracked. 跟踪中的无效密码和密码提示问题答案尝试次数， ， ， ，和方法。Invalid password and password-answer attempts are tracked in the , , , , and methods. ## Examples 有关的示例实现，请参阅[实现配置文件提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

span.span: One of the values indicating the format for storing passwords in the data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示密码存储中的格式。The property indicates the format that passwords are stored in. 使用`Hashed`仅，`Clear`和`Encrypted`是不安全的。Use `Hashed` only, `Clear` and `Encrypted` are not secure. `Hashed` 密码是使用单向哈希算法和一个随机生成的 salt 值时存储在数据库中哈希处理。`Hashed` passwords are hashed using a one-way hash algorithm and a randomly generated salt value when stored in the database. 密码验证时，会将它哈希与验证的数据库中的 salt 值。When a password is validated, it is hashed with the salt value in the database for verification. 无法检索经过哈希处理的密码。Hashed passwords cannot be retrieved. `Encrypted` 密码不会视为安全的如受到破坏，可以显示出您的数据库的内容还可以公开的加密密钥。`Encrypted` passwords are not considered safe, as a breach that reveals your database contents can also expose the encryption key. 这意味着无法解密加密的密码，并将其公开。This means your encrypted passwords could be decrypted and exposed. 你可以使用和的虚拟方法类进行加密和解密密码值，也可以提供加密数据的代码。You can use the and virtual methods of the class to encrypt and decrypt password values, or you can supply your own encryption code. 如果你使用和的虚拟方法类，`Encrypted`密码进行加密使用中提供的密钥信息[machineKey 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46)在配置中的元素。If you use the and virtual methods of the class, `Encrypted` passwords are encrypted using the key information supplied in the [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46) element in your configuration. ## Examples 有关的示例实现，请参阅[实现配置文件提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取用于计算密码复杂性为正则表达式对象。The property gets the regular expression used to evaluate password complexity for the object. 属性设置在应用程序配置中使用`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)配置元素。The property is set in the application configuration using the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)中的配置元素`system.web`的应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分。The following example shows the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element in the `system.web` section of the application's Web.config file. 它指定应用程序使用的实例类以提供成员资格服务，并设置`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`属性设为正则表达式验证密码是否满足以下条件：It specifies that the application use an instance of the class to provide membership services, and sets the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute to a regular expression that validates that the password meets the following criteria: - 大于七个字符。Is greater than seven characters. - 包含至少一个数字。Contains at least one digit. - 包含至少一个特殊的 （非字母数字） 字符。Contains at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 如果密码不满足这些条件，密码不接受的成员资格提供程序。If the password does not meet these criteria, the password is not accepted by the membership provider. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用，作为输入、 用户名和密码提示问题答案并生成一个新的随机密码，用于指定用户。Takes, as input, a user name and a password answer and generates a new, random password for the specified user. > [!NOTE] > 通过创建随机密码方法不能保证传递中的正则表达式属性。The random password created by the method is not guaranteed to pass the regular expression in the property. 但是，随机的密码将满足条件由建立和属性However, the random password will meet the criteria established by the and properties 方法用新的密码值更新数据源中的用户信息，并返回以字符串形式的新密码。The method updates the user information in the data source with the new password value and returns the new password as a string. 一个用于生成随机密码方便机制是方法。A convenient mechanism for generating a random password is the method. 确保标志设置为`true`之前执行任何操作。 ensures that the flag is set to `true` before performing any action. 如果是`false`、引发异常。If is `false`, a exception is thrown. 此外将检查的值属性。 also checks the value of the property. 如果是`true`，检查对照数据源中存储的密码提示问题答案提供的答案参数的值。If is `true`, checks the value of the supplied answer parameter against the stored password answer in the data source. 如果不匹配，引发异常。If they do not match, a exception is thrown. ## Examples 有关的示例实现，请参阅[实现配置文件提供程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For an example of a implementation, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98).
